articles.title: Ashleigh Buhai overcomes late triple, wins AIG Women's Open in four-hole playoff - Golf Channel
articles.description: Ashleigh Buhai recovered from throwing away a five-shot lead at the AIG Women’s Open by beating In Gee Chun in a playoff.
